analysis.key_quote: Let us preserve our nonpartisan, merit-based civil service. Please withdraw the rule proposed by the Personnel Management Office on 04/23/25 titled "Improving Performance, Accountability and Responsiveness in the Civil Service"
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, emphasizing the importance of a nonpartisan and merit-based civil service, which aligns with concerns about politicization and the integrity of the civil service system.
